mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog ( title, content, write_date, hits, summary, scope, blog_status, blog_from, category, space_id, comment_scope, blog_level, recommend ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writeDate}, 0, #{summary}, #{scope,javaType=Scope,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{status,javaType=BlogStatus,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{from,javaType=BlogFrom,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{category.id}, #{space.id}, #{commentScope,javaType=Scope,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{level}, #{recommend} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.id,b.summary,b.blog_level,b.write_date,b.title,b.hits,b.blog_from,b.category,b.space_id,bc.category_name,b.scope,comment_scope,blog_status,b.content,b.recommend,GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(t.tag_name,'_',t.id)) AS tagList FROM blog b LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_category bc ON b.category = bc.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_tag bt ON bt.blog = b.id LEFT OUTER JOIN tag t ON bt.tag_id = t.id WHERE b.id = #{id} GROUP BY b.id
